@title AraProxy
@dev Gives the possibility to delegate any call to a foreign implementation.
nodes.name: AraProxy

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Only the AraRegistry can upgrade this proxy."

arguments.value: Only the AraRegistry can upgrade this proxy.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Only the AraRegistry can upgrade this proxy."

nodes.documentation: @dev the constructor sets the AraRegistry address

@dev Fallback function allowing to perform a delegatecall to the given implementation.
This function will return whatever the implementation call returns
